posts.post_content: I run a singleton of this guy with [Empyrial Archangel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Empyrial Archangel), grabbing whichever one is more advantageous at the moment. I find that [Lightning Greaves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Greaves) is an awesome way to protect him, as well as swing for 5 in the air immediately, if the skies are clear.

posts.post_content: ...That's a \*lot\* of mana. I think nowadays, [Iona, Shield of Emeria](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Iona, Shield of Emeria) is preferable, if you happen to have nine white mana kicking around. And if you're playing black reanimator, [Empyrial Archangel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Empyrial Archangel) is better for the shroud, and has basically the same effect.
